Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+56E0

Main pronunciation 主要发音: yīn

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) a mat to sit on (now) meaning cause.

English senses 英语理解: cause, reason; by; because (of)

Usage example 用法举例: 因此 yīn cǐ (therefore)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 107

Shuowen 说文解字: 就也從囗大徐锴曰左傳日植有禮因重固能大者眾圍就之

囙字的基本解释

囙
yīn
古同“因”。╇

囙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīn］
［《廣韻》於真切，平真，影。］
亦作“囙1”。
(1)亲；亲近。
(2)相就；趋赴。
(3)顺；顺应。
(4)沿袭，承袭。
(5)依托；利用；凭借。
(6)连接。
(7)增添；累积。
(8)原因，原由。
(9)机会。
(10)犹；如同。
(11)副词。就；于是。
(12)介词。趁，乘。
(13)介词。依照；根据。
(14)介词。为；为了。
(15)连词。因而；因此。
(16)连词。因为；由于。
(17)通“姻”。婚配。
(18)通“姻”。指有婚姻关系的亲戚。
(19)因明学术语。近人译为小前提。
(20)旧谓一位乘数的乘法。
(21)姓。明有因礼。

囙字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【囗字部】　囙； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页216第18
【正字通】俗因字。

Basic explanation of words

yīn
Gu Tong "cause". ╇
囙
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīn］
["Guangyun" is true, plain, and shadowy. ]
Also known as "囙1".
(1) Close; close.
(2) Get together; go for it.
(3) Compliance; compliance.
(4) Inheritance, inheritance.
(5) Relying on; using; relying on.
(6) Connection.
(7) Add; accumulate.
(8) Reasons and reasons.
(9) Opportunity.
(10) Jude; as.
(11) Adverbs. Just; so.
(12) Prepositions. Take advantage of it, multiply.
(13) Prepositions. According to
(14) Prepositions. For; for.
(15) Conjunctions. Therefore; therefore.
(16) Conjunctions. Because of
(17) Through "marriage". Marriage.
(18) Through "marriage". Refers to relatives who are married.
(19) Yinming terminology. The recent translation is a small premise.
(20) The old one is the multiplication of one multiplier.
(21) Last name. Obviously because of etiquette.
囙

[Chou Ji 1] [囗字部] 　囙; Kangxi strokes: 5; Page number: page 216 to 18
[Zhengzitong] The common cause of the word.
